edu.cs495.engine.game

Class AbstractGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.game.AbstractGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Game

    public abstract class AbstractGame
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract game handler. Each game contains a level, camera, and abstract methods for initialization, updating, and rendering.
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
